title: Up, Up and Away
seo_title: Up, Up and Away | Wine Country Inn
seo_description: From treetops to magnificent panoramic views, enjoy a spectacular morning soaring above it all.
short_description: From treetops to magnificent panoramic views, enjoy a spectacular morning soaring above it all.
long_description:
From treetops to magnificent panoramic views, enjoy a spectacular morning soaring above it all. Enjoy an approximately one hour flight followed by a scrumptious post-flight champagne brunch at Domaine Chandon Winery. Arrive a few minutes early for complimentary pre-flight coffee, tea and pastries. Up, Up And Away Package also Includes hotel pick up and drop off, and complimentary in-flight photos.

Each Friday and Saturday evening our guests enjoy a complimentary wine and cheese tasting served in the Winery House, hosted by a local vintner.

Package Includes:

  • Hot air balloon ride for Two
  • Complimentary pre flight coffee tea and pastries
  • Post flight Champagne brunch at Domain Chandon Winery
  • Hotel pick up and drop off
  • Complimentary in flight photo
  • Weekend Wine Tasting served in the Winery House hosted by a local vintner
  • Split of Napa Valley Wine in your room upon arrival
